text: Electric Circuits, Non-assessed problem Sheet Week2 1. (a) Use Kirchhoff’s laws to find the current in the 1Ω resistor in the circuit shown below. (b) Repeat the above problem by first finding Thévenin’s equivalent circuit at the terminals A and B. (Hint: To do this you need to remove the 1Ω resistor and then find the open circuit voltage VAB and the resistance looking back into the terminals.) + 3 Ω –10 V 2 Ω 1 Ω + – 5 V A B
